snippet: To the Editor:   Re your June 4 front-page article on affirmative action: A degree from a prestigious college should reflect something beyond that the holder was able to impress that college's admissions committee enough to gain admission. College...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re your June 4 front-page article on affirmative action: A degree from a prestigious college should reflect something beyond that the holder was able to impress that college's admissions committee enough to gain admission. Colleges are supposed to be graduating students who are more knowledgeable and better thinkers than when they entered.
